content.value:
I would LOVE a box on the @GitHubEng PR page that says which was the first Release this merge made it into.

Eg: has issue; googles; finds PR that seems to address it; PR is merged!; is PR in the version I'm running?; what version do I need to bump to?; has it made any release?
